Mod.name: rpg
Mod.author: meso
Mod.description: Kill the Tyrannical King! Meant to be played with 3 players.

lightning.name: Light Beam
lightning.description: The Chroma King's very own creation.

clericw.name: Divine Heal
clericw.description: Heals people around you and speeds you up!

clerice.name: Blood Sacrifice
clerice.description: Sacrfice your party's health to get a moderate boost in attack.

clericr.name: Godly Control
clericr.description: Creates a small area where you have no cooldowns and no enemy projectiles can reside.

lancerq.name: Space Blade
lancerq.description: Get a good speed boost while damaging!

lancerw.name: Weakening Meteors
lancerw.description: A spray of meteors that drastically reduce enemy damage output.

lancere.description: Dash and create a tear in reality that spawns blocking projectiles! Gives brief invincibilty.
lancere.name: Galaxy Rift

lancerr.name: Spatial Distorions
lancerr.description: Pull all enemy projctiles in for a big burst to remove them! Gives you a LOT of invincibility.

tanke.description: Create a sunburst that blocks mosts attacks and leaves an opening!
tanke.name: Protective Strike

tankw.name: Radiant Sun
tankw.description: Dash forward with OOMPH and block most attacks! You may be a bit vulnerable afterwards, however.

tankq.description: A burst of sun that can silence foes. However, the silencing is useless whilst they charge.
tankq.name: Light Beam

tankr.name: Prism Armor
tankr.description: Stop all enemy projectiles in your path! Deals minor burn damage.

boss.name: boss
boss.description: Passive ability. Every atom in your body is imbued with inner strength.

effects.title: Resistant
effects.text: Reduce damage received by 15%. Applies to all forms of damage, including void damage.

helix.description: Steal some life from your enemy. They probably didn't need it anyway.

reactor.name: Light Beam
reactor.description: The Chroma King's very own creation.
